text: aur jaho kaheen hatte chadhe unapar roosavaee kee maar padee magar khuda ke ehad (ya) aur logon ke ehad ke zariye se (unako kaheen panaah mil gayee) aur phir herapher ke khuda ke gazab mein pad gae aur unapar mohataajee kee maar (alag) padee ye (kyon) is sabab se ki vah khuda kee aayaton se inkaar karate the aur paigambaron ko naahaq qatl karate the ye saza usakee hai ki unhonne naafaramaanee kee aur had se guzar gae the
